content.rendered:
Sarah Romero

Director, National Accounts

BS in Human Resources Management, Minor in Psychology: San Jose State

 

Hi, I’m Sarah Romero. As the Director of National Accounts at ATR, I’m responsible for building strong relationships with our clients. I help support our recruiting team by being the liaison between the client and recruiters, serving as the main point of contact and helping to communicate the client’s needs clearly. I help manage our communications with the client, ensuring our contact information is up to date. I like getting to meet and know new people and work diligently to expand my knowledge and understanding of the staffing industry. If I truly understand the needs of our clients and I am better able to provide great fitting candidates.

 

ADVICE:

Advice for Candidates: Don’t put all your eggs in one basket, but treat every opportunity as your only one.

Advice for Hiring Managers: we agree that quality and efficiency are both important. As a team, we try to remain quick and efficient while still delivering quality candidates. Sometimes quality takes a little more time, please be patient. 

 


 

 

INSPIRATIONAL QUOTE:

“With every door that closes a new one opens.” – Alexander Graham Bell
